title: Alert - Sign-in
description: Helps users complete the sign-in process on VA.gov

frontMatter.title: Alert - Sign-in
frontMatter.description: Helps users complete the sign-in process on VA.gov

when_to_use.value: Static pages with entry points to online tools managed by the CAIA team in Drupal
Form intro pages created and managed by product teams (URLs ending in `/introduction`)
Exception: Forms only accessible after signing in should display the alert on the unauthenticated entry point page

content_considerations.value: Requires or allows sign-in but accepts unverified accounts
Is an online form allowing sign-in without prefill
Offers alternative sign-in benefits (e.g., Intent to File generation)
Requires My HealtheVet registration (messages, medications, medical records)
**LOA1:** Low-assurance with self-asserted identity and basic authentication
**LOA3:** High-assurance requiring verified identity and strong authentication
**IAL2:** Identity verified remotely or in-person with documentation

accessibility.value: **Do not assign ARIA roles.** This static alert loads with the page and doesn't require a role.
**Use only appropriate branding images** per Login.gov and ID.me brand guidelines.
Follow parent Alert component accessibility guidance.
Readability: Conditional Pass (dependent on implementation context)

frontMatter.code_usage:
<va-alert-sign-in
  variant="signInRequired"
  heading-level="2"
></va-alert-sign-in>

<!-- Optional sign-in -->
<va-alert-sign-in
  variant="signInOptional"
  heading-level="2"
  no-sign-in-link="/form-start"
></va-alert-sign-in>
